about_the_game:
The release of a new mixed reality implant device, dubbed Eternal Summer, promises its users will experience just that.
When a solar storm hits earth the devices are catastrophically damaged, trapping users in their simulations.
Those who are still 'free' must now find their own ways to survive, as they band together into factions.

In this hex-tile turn based strategy game, you control your faction as you try to expand your control against opposing factions.
Some factions may be friendly, others are definitely not, but all have a story to tell about their version of the day the of great aurora.

content_descriptors.notes:
Contains references to Violence.
Contains language that may offend.
Mature audience strongly advised.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 (SP1+), Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX10, DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 10
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 / Windows 11
  • Processor: x86, x64 architecture with SSE2 instruction set support.
  • Graphics: DX11, DX12 capable.
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Additional Notes: Still in Development, but game is not graphically intense.
